revised_title: Optical Observations of Solar Flares and the Physics of the Solar Atmosphere
tldr: This article discusses the physics of the solar atmosphere, specifically focusing on optical observations of solar flares. The authors describe the characteristics of flares, including their magnetic fields and the radiation emitted during the event. They also discuss the importance of understanding these phenomena for studying the sun's behavior and its impact on Earth.
